text: are tera BBC mujhe bohot acha laga tha uss din. Kaha gye wo dinn
author: Navlakshya  Basra

text:
Bhai! Dost to lmbe time se hain hum. Gakhal sir ki class se...
Tere saath train ka 16-20 ghnte ka safar kabhi lmba nahi lgta tha. Baaton mein nikal jata tha poora. Duniya kai koi topic nahi chhora hoga humne. Train mein FIFA bhi khel liya. Aur Punjab aate hi language transition from hindi to punjabi!
Humara FIFA match zrur hoga firse.... Aur is baar tujhe pakka haraunga!!! XD
author: Navlakshya  Basra

text: mech bois hum hai par uss din tune meri gaand maari thi merko bohot gussa aaya tha. Wo dinn jab tune mujhe marks nhi bataye the.
author: Navlakshya  Basra

text: Jab tak iss duniya mein vipul jaise log hain tab tak koi chain se nahi jee sakta
author: Navlakshya  Basra
